mapper.select: select count(1) from ( select t1.id,t1.dealer_id,t1.category_id,t1.hospital_id,t2.hospital_name,t2.address,t2.hostpital_category,t2.level_id,t3.level_name,t2.provinces,t2.area,t2.city from tb_dealer_auth_hospital t1 inner join tb_hospital t2 on t1.hospital_id = t2.id left join tb_hospital_level t3 on t2.level_id = t3.id ) t

select * from ( select t1.id,t1.dealer_id,t1.category_id,t1.hospital_id,t2.hospital_name,t2.address,t2.hostpital_category,t2.level_id,t3.level_name,t2.provinces,t2.area,t2.city from tb_dealer_auth_hospital t1 inner join tb_hospital t2 on t1.hospital_id = t2.id left join tb_hospital_level t3 on t2.level_id = t3.id ) t
mapper.update: update tb_dealer_auth_hospital set hospital_id=#{hospital_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_dealer_auth_hospital where dealer_id = #{dealer_id} and category_id=#{category_id}
